author: jwoolley
msg: Pull in restart fix to the 2.0.23 tag

author: trawick
msg: Fix a restart problem when cgid is used.  Code in the parent
httpd process was trying to clear a pool which is now only

author: rbb
msg: If we are going to get the length of a brigade, it helps if that
brigade has data.  To that end, if we have just expanded ctx->b, we need
to concat ctx->b to the end of b, so that b has something to pass
This fixes the problem with the proxy not proxying non-keepalive

author: rbb
msg: Add a comment so that the next poor fool who re-writes this section
of code will know about this case.
